sql.query: UPDATE event_log_settings SET setting_name='submissionId' WHERE setting_name='articleId'
UPDATE review_assignments SET date_response_due = date_due WHERE date_response_due IS NULL
UPDATE plugin_settings SET setting_value=1 WHERE setting_name='context' AND LOWER(plugin_name) LIKE '%blockplugin'
UPDATE submission_files SET viewable = 1 WHERE file_stage = 2 AND viewable = 0

INSERT INTO edit_decisions (submission_id, review_round_id, stage_id, round, decision, editor_id, date_decided) SELECT DISTINCT ed.submission_id, 0, 1, 0, 8, ed.editor_id, ed.date_decided FROM edit_decisions ed JOIN (SELECT submission_id, MIN(date_decided) AS date_decided FROM edit_decisions GROUP BY submission_id) ed1 ON (ed1.submission_id = ed.submission_id) WHERE ed.stage_id = 3 AND ed1.date_decided = ed.date_decided AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT ed2.submission_id FROM edit_decisions ed2 WHERE ed2.stage_id = 1 AND ed2.decision = 8 AND ed2.submission_id = ed.submission_id)
UPDATE filter_groups SET output_type = 'xml::schema(https://www.crossref.org/schemas/crossref4.3.6.xsd)' WHERE output_type = 'xml::schema(http://www.crossref.org/schema/deposit/crossref4.3.6.xsd)'

DELETE FROM journal_settings WHERE setting_name IN ('focusScopeDesc', 'reviewPolicy', 'pubFreqPolicy', 'openAccessPolicy', 'customAboutItems', 'contributorNote', 'contributors', 'sponsorNote', 'sponsors', 'history')
DELETE FROM email_templates_default WHERE email_key IN ('GIFT_AVAILABLE', 'GIFT_USER_REGISTER', 'GIFT_USER_LOGIN')

DELETE FROM email_templates WHERE email_key IN ('GIFT_AVAILABLE', 'GIFT_USER_REGISTER', 'GIFT_USER_LOGIN')
DELETE FROM email_templates_data WHERE email_key IN ('GIFT_AVAILABLE', 'GIFT_USER_REGISTER', 'GIFT_USER_LOGIN')

DELETE FROM submission_settings WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::depositStatus' AND submission_id IN (SELECT submission_id FROM (SELECT * FROM submission_settings) AS ss2 WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::status')

DELETE FROM submission_settings WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::depositStatusUrl' AND submission_id IN (SELECT submission_id FROM (SELECT * FROM submission_settings) AS ss2 WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::statusUrl')

UPDATE submission_settings SET setting_name = 'crossref::statusUrl' WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::depositStatusUrl'
